fact.description: The match is underway at Estadio das Dunas.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hotaru Yamaguchi (Japan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Japan a goal kick.
Free kick Japan.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Important block from the Japan defence as Kostas Mitroglou fires in a strike for Greece.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Goal kick for Japan at Estadio das Dunas.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
In Natal Greece drive forward through Panagiotis Kone. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece.
Makoto Hasebe (Japan) has received a first yellow card.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greece needs to be cautious. Japan have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Japan.
Yuya Osako for Japan is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Japan at Estadio das Dunas.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Japan drive forward and Yuya Osako gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Japan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Japan are coming forward and Yuya Osako gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Greece have a goal kick.
Japan to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan.
Greece awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Free kick Greece.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greece push forward at Estadio das Dunas and Giannis Maniatis gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Japan defence.
Kostas Katsouranis (Greece) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Japan throw-in in Greece's half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Greece a goal kick.
Japan's Keisuke Honda is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Japan.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Kostas Mitroglou is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The match in Natal is underway once more.
Kostas Mitroglou returns to the field for Greece after picking up a slight injury.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a throw-in for Japan, close to Greece's area.
Japan are pushing forward but Yoshito Okubo's finish is wide of the goal.
Greece have a goal kick.
Japan have a dangerous throw-in.
Fanis Gekas (Greece) has replaced the possibly injured Kostas Mitroglou at Estadio das Dunas.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Japan to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Greece awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Japan at Estadio das Dunas.
Japan awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio das Dunas, Kostas Katsouranis has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Yuya Osako (Japan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Greece's Vasilis Torosidis gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Japan defender.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece drive forward but Fanis Gekas is judged offside.
Georgios Karagounis is replacing Giannis Fetfatzidis for Greece at Estadio das Dunas.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Free kick Japan.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece.
Greece surge into the attack at Estadio das Dunas but Vasilis Torosidis’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Japan at Estadio das Dunas.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
Fanis Gekas of Greece is pulled up for offside.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Japan throw-in in Greece's half.
Throw-in for Japan close to the penalty box.
The first-half has come to a close in Natal.
Yasuhito Endo is on a sub for Makoto Hasebe for Japan.
Greece's Georgios Samaras breaks free at Estadio das Dunas. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Japan throw-in in Greece's half.
Free kick Japan.
Yasuhito Endo of Japan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Greece at Estadio das Dunas.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Keisuke Honda of Japan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece.
Free kick Japan.
Georgios Samaras (Greece) has received a yellow card from Joel Aguilar Chicas.
In Natal, Yasuhito Endo of Japan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Japan drive upfield and Atsuto Uchida gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Greece defender.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Greece have a goal kick.
Japan make their second substitution with Shinji Kagawa replacing Yuya Osako.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Jose Holebas (Greece) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece push forward at Estadio das Dunas and Fanis Gekas gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Japan defence.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Greece's Panagiotis Kone gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Japan a goal kick.
Greece are in shooting range from this free kick.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece.
Free kick Japan.
Joel Aguilar Chicas waits before resuming play because Maya Yoshida for Japan is still down.
Play has been resumed.
Attention is being given to Greece’s Vasilis Torosidis and play has been suspended briefly.
Vasilis Torosidis is back on the pitch.
Maya Yoshida for Japan is back on the field again.
Japan drive upfield and Keisuke Honda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Greece defender.
In Natal Japan attack through Yoshito Okubo. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan in their own half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Japan.
Japan to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Can Japan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Greece's half?
Japan's Atsuto Uchida misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Greece at Estadio das Dunas.
Greece to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Ball safe as Greece is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Greece a goal kick.
Free kick Japan.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Japan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Japan push forward through Yoshito Okubo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Japan.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Greece's Panagiotis Kone gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Japan defender.
Dimitris Salpingidis is on a sub for Panagiotis Kone for Greece.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Georgios Samaras's header is off-target for Greece.
Japan have a goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Japan throw-in in Greece's half.
Atsuto Uchida (Japan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Japan have been awarded a corner by Joel Aguilar Chicas.
Japan are coming forward and Maya Yoshida gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Joel Aguilar Chicas awards Greece a goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Japan goal kick.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a Japan throw-in in Greece's half.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Japan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jose Holebas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Greece.
Vasilis Torosidis (Greece) gets a yellow card.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Japan's Yasuhito Endo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio das Dunas. But the effort is unsuccessful.
4 minutes will be added to the second half.
Greece to take a throw-in in Japan territory.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece.
Throw-in Japan.
Joel Aguilar Chicas signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Japan's half?
Japan have a goal kick.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
